text: Martin Novák (born November 2, 1988) is a Czech professional ice hockey player. He is currently playing for LHK Jestřábi Prostějov of the Czech 1.liga. Novák made his Czech Extraliga debut playing with HC Slovan Bratislava during the 2007-08 Czech Extraliga season. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:HC Most players Category:HC Sparta Praha players Category:HC Slovan Bratislava players Category:HC Slovan Ústečtí Lvi players Category:HC Stadion Litoměřice players Category:LHK Jestřábi Prostějov players Category:Motor České Budějovice players Category:Czech ice hockey forwards
title: Martin Novák
